description: This file contains declarations for file I/O functions related to extracting and saving hostname information from configuration files and markers, used as part of the 'touchstone' SDK integration.

methods.name: extractHostnameFromCommConf
methods.description: Parses a communication configuration file to extract the hostname. The caller must free the returned string.

methods.name: extractHostnameFromMarker
methods.description: Extracts hostname data from a specified marker text file.

methods.name: saveHostnameToMarker
methods.description: Creates a marker file with the provided hostname as its contents.
